get.description:
Get invited users.

This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of users invited by a specific user.

post.description:
Invite a new user.

This endpoint allows inviting a new user.

get.description:
Get integrator by user ID.

This endpoint retrieves the integrator associated with a specific user.

Check user invitation.

This endpoint verifies if a user was invited by a specific integrator.

Check user invitation.

This endpoint verifies if a user was invited by a specific integrator.

post.description:
Create a new permission.

This endpoint allows for the creation of a new permission.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of permissions.

This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of permissions based on provided filters.

Retrieve a permission by ID.

This endpoint retrieves a permission by its unique ID.

delete.description:
Delete a permission by ID.

This endpoint deletes a permission by its unique ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Permission Permissions  Permission Id  Delete

post.description:
Create a new role.

This endpoint allows for the creation of a new role.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of roles.

This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of roles based on provided filters.

Retrieve a role by ID.

This endpoint retrieves a role by its unique ID.

delete.description:
Delete a role by ID.

This endpoint deletes a role by its unique ID.

post.description:
Add a permission to a role by ID.

This endpoint allows adding a permission to an existing role.

Add a permission to a role by ID.

This endpoint allows adding a permission to an existing role.

delete.description:
Remove a permission to a role by ID.

This endpoint allows adding a permission to an existing role.

post.description:
Create a new user.

This endpoint allows for the creation of a new user.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of users.

This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of users based on provided filters.

Retrieve a user by ID.

This endpoint retrieves a user by their unique ID.

put.description:
Update a user by ID.

This endpoint updates the details of an existing user.

post.description:
Change a user's email by ID.

This endpoint allows changing the email of an existing user.

Change a user's password by ID.

This endpoint allows changing the password of an existing user.

Register a user.

This endpoint registers a new user with the provided information.

Log in a user.

This endpoint allows a user to log in with the provided credentials.

LOGIN_BAD_CREDENTIALS.summary: Bad credentials or the user is inactive.
